author: James Hibberd
title: SHOULD NETFLIX BE FREE?
description: Should Netflix, Amazon and other streaming services be free for 60 days due to the coronavirus stay-at-home orders?
content:
Is Tiger King an essential service?
A petition is gaining traction on Change.org for streaming services like Netflix, Disney Plus and Amazon Prime to give 60 days of free service.
